verses.roman:
iṣṭagoṣṭhī kata-kṣaṇa kari' tāṅra sane
jhaḍu-ṭhākura kahe tāṅre madhura vacane

synonyms: iṣṭa-goṣṭhī—discussion; kata-kṣaṇa—for some time; kari'-performing; tāṅra sane—with him; jhaḍu-ṭhākura—Jhaḍu Ṭhākura; kahe—says; tāṅre—unto him (Kālidāsa); madhura vacane—in sweet words.
translation: After a discussion for some time with Kālidāsa, Jhaḍu Ṭhākura said something to him in sweet words.
